General.Name: Tulikivi Oyj A
General.Description: Tulikivi Corporation manufactures and sells fireplaces, sauna heaters, and interior decoration products in Finland, the United States, and rest of Europe. The company offers heat-retaining soapstone and ceramic fireplaces, soapstone and ceramic fireplaces with bake oven, bake ovens and cookstoves, and convection fireplaces; and senso fireplace controllers, pellet systems, and color fireplaces. It also provides electric, wood-fired, and smoke sauna heaters; communal saunas; control units; and sauna stones. In addition, the company offers interior and paving stone products. Tulikivi Corporation was founded in 1893 and is headquartered in Juuka, Finland.

4.Name: Mr. Erkki  Kuronen
4.Title: Managing Director of Nordic Talc Oy
